Class PodcastUpdateFrequency

java.lang.Object
com.apptasticsoftware.rssreader.module.podcast.PodcastUpdateFrequency
public class PodcastUpdateFrequency extends Object
Represents the &lt;podcast:updateFrequency&gt; element for expressing a podcast's release schedule.

Contains a free-form description (max 128 characters) and optional attributes: complete, dtstart (ISO8601 date/datetime), and rrule (iCalendar RFC 5545 recurrence rule).

See Also:
  • iCalendar RFC 5545 Section 3.3.10

  • Method Details

    • getUpdateFrequency

      public String getUpdateFrequency()
      Gets the node value describing the update frequency.

      This is a free-form string that might be displayed alongside other information about the podcast. The value should not exceed 128 characters to avoid truncation by aggregators.

      Returns:
      the update frequency string, or null if not set

    • setUpdateFrequency

      public void setUpdateFrequency(String updateFrequency)
      Sets the node value describing the update frequency.

      This is a free-form string that might be displayed alongside other information about the podcast. Please do not exceed 128 characters for this value or it may be truncated by aggregators.

      Parameters:
      updateFrequency - the update frequency string (preferably not exceeding 128 characters)

    • isComplete

      public boolean isComplete()
      Checks if the podcast is complete with no intention to release further episodes.

      This boolean attribute specifies if the podcast has no intention to release further episodes. If not set, this should be assumed to be false.

      Returns:
      true if the podcast is complete, false otherwise

    • setComplete

      public void setComplete(boolean complete)
      Sets whether the podcast is complete with no intention to release further episodes.

      This boolean attribute specifies if the podcast has no intention to release further episodes.

      Parameters:
      complete - true if the podcast is complete, false otherwise

    • getDtstart

      public Optional<String> getDtstart()
      Gets the date or datetime the recurrence rule begins.

      This is an ISO8601-formatted string representing when the recurrence rule starts. If the recurrence rule contains a value for COUNT, this attribute is required. If the recurrence rule contains a value for UNTIL, this attribute must be formatted to the same date/datetime standard as the UNTIL value.

      Returns:
      an Optional containing the ISO8601-formatted dtstart string, or an empty Optional if not set

    • getDtstartAsZonedDateTime

      public Optional<ZonedDateTime> getDtstartAsZonedDateTime()
      Gets the date or datetime the recurrence rule begins as a ZonedDateTime.

      This is a parsed version of the ISO8601-formatted dtstart string. If the recurrence rule contains a value for COUNT, this attribute is required. If the recurrence rule contains a value for UNTIL, this attribute must be formatted to the same date/datetime standard as the UNTIL value.

      Returns:
      an Optional containing the parsed ZonedDateTime, or an empty Optional if not set

    • setDtstart

      public void setDtstart(String dtstart)
      Sets the date or datetime the recurrence rule begins.

      This should be an ISO8601-formatted string representing when the recurrence rule starts. If the recurrence rule contains a value for COUNT, this attribute is required. If the recurrence rule contains a value for UNTIL, this attribute must be formatted to the same date/datetime standard as the UNTIL value.

      Parameters:
      dtstart - the ISO8601-formatted date/datetime string when the recurrence rule begins

    • getRrule

      public String getRrule()
      Gets the recurrence rule for this update frequency.

      This is a recurrence rule as defined in iCalendar RFC 5545 Section 3.3.10. The rule defines the frequency and pattern of release episodes.

      Common examples include:

      • FREQ=DAILY - Daily releases
      • FREQ=WEEKLY - Weekly releases
      • FREQ=WEEKLY;INTERVAL=2 - Biweekly releases
      • FREQ=WEEKLY;BYDAY=MO,WE - Every Monday and Wednesday
      • FREQ=WEEKLY;UNTIL=2023-12-31T00:00:00.000Z;BYDAY=MO - Every Monday until a specific date
      • FREQ=WEEKLY;INTERVAL=2;BYDAY=MO;COUNT=10 - Biweekly on Monday for 10 episodes
      Returns:
      the recurrence rule string, or null if not set
      See Also:
      • iCalendar RFC 5545 Section 3.3.10

    • setRrule

      public void setRrule(String rrule)
      Sets the recurrence rule for this update frequency.

      This should be a recurrence rule as defined in iCalendar RFC 5545 Section 3.3.10. The rule defines the frequency and pattern of release episodes.

      Parameters:
      rrule - the recurrence rule string
      See Also:
      • iCalendar RFC 5545 Section 3.3.10
